enhanced_by.reason: The run method relies on the Shell instance being properly initialized, which is done by the create method.
The run method uses the configuration parsed by the parse method to determine its behavior.
The run method sets up the environment and then calls the extracted method to handle the main logic of the shell, making it a good candidate for assertions.
The run method prints the banner if the configuration requires it, making the banner method a good candidate for assertions related to startup output.
